_sText:
2_04_05 4:09pm
De_lochs version "2"
Map and cusotm textures made by Vig AKA Mark Dygert
Site: www.vigville.com/de_lochs
Email: vig@vigville.com

=========================


Install instructions:
--------------------------------------------
- Unzip de_lochs2.zip to your cstrike folder normally found in;
*X:program files\valve\Steam\SteamApps\yoursteamnamehere\counter-strike source\

Manual Install:
- Place de_lochs2.bsp, de_lochs2.nav, de_lochs2.txt inside your cstrike\maps folder.Normally found in:
 X:program files\valve\Steam\SteamApps\yoursteamnamehere\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\

*or wherever you installed steam to, hopefully you know how to find the cstrike folder by either doing a search or you just know how to find it...



==========================
Contents:
-----------------------------------------------
- de_lochs2.bsp:
This is the main map file that also contains all the custom textures that Where used for the map.

- de_lochs2.nav:
This is the navigation file for the bots. I included it so you don't have to spend the 15 min setting up the bots for the first time.

- de_lochs2.txt:
This file contains the text you see at the beginning of the map. You know the text that no one reads?

The custom textures I created for this map have been compiled into the bsp file so there is no need for a res file. What a pain that was...

A special "thanks" ester egg room has been included in the map for who are adventerous enough to find it. 

There are a lot of changes, new routes, new places to hide, more detail. And above all I have optimized the holy crap out of the map using every trick I know how to use. I even used a few I had no clue could be done before =) It runs great all of the test machines, so if you encounter poor FPS it will be news to me =P

===========================
Download VERSION 2.0 and view CURRENT screen shots:
-------------------------------------------------
http://www.vigville.com/de_lochs/
